Daihatsu Rocky Belum Dijual di Indonesia, ADM: Harga Enggak Masuk
07 Nov 2019, 11:12 by Wira Utama, Eko Ari Wibowo
TEMPO.CO, Jakarta - Produk kolaborasi Daihatsu Rocky dan Toyota Raize resmi dilepas ke pasar Jepang. Harga Daihatsu Rocky lebih mahal dari Raize.
"Kalau speknya sama, harganya pasti sama. Itu karena kita produk kolaborasi. Tapu kalau harga beda, pasti ada spek yang beda,"ujar Direktur Marketing Astra Daihatsu Motor, Amelia Tjandra di kawasan Senayan, Kamis, 7 November 2019.
Dia pun membantah ihwal Daihatsu Rocky lebih baik dari Toyota Raize karena harga tersebut. Sebab, menurutnya, urusan harga tergantug dengan pilihan spesifikasi yang tersedia pada produk.
"Tidak juga, ini pilihan aja karena ada beberapa mobil kita mahal tapi dia (Toyota) juga ada yang lebih mahal. Alasannya karena pilihan speknya berbeda, disesuaikan dengan target customernya,"ujarnya.
Adapun harga Daihatsu Rocky jika masuk Indonesia dianggap akan kemahalan. Menurut Amel, jika merujuk harga di Jepang, kemungkinan pasar Indonesia sulit menerima.
"Harga mobil dengan pajak hampir sama. Jadi kalau beli beli mobil di Jepang katakanlah Rp 100 juta sampai di Indonesia pajaknya Rp100 juta, jadi dua kali lipat ditambah ongkos kirim,"ujarnya.
Untuk diketahui harga Daihatsu Rocky di Jepang dibanderol mulai Rp 219 jutaan untuk varian terendah dan Rp 311 jutaan untuk varian tertinggi. Harga itu sedikit lebih mahal dari Toyota Raize yang dibanderol mulai Rp 217 jutaan hingga Rp 296 jutaan.
"Tapi apakah kita ambil mobil dari Jepang (CBU) atau tidak itu masih kita pelajari. Belum bisa langsung masuk karena harganya bisa mahal banget. Enggak cocok untuk kita," kata dia.

Daihatsu Rocky Has Not Been Sold in Indonesia, ADM: Price Is Not Entering
07 Nov 2019, 11:12 AM by Wira Utama, Eko Ari Wibowo
TEMPO.CO, Jakarta - Daihatsu Rocky and Toyota Raize collaboration products have officially been released to the Japanese market. Daihatsu Rocky prices are more expensive than Raize.
"If the specs are the same, the price must be the same. That's because we are a collaboration product. But if the price is different, there must be a different spec," said Astra Daihatsu Motor's Marketing Director, Amelia Tjandra in the Senayan area, Thursday, November 7, 2019.
He also denied that Daihatsu Rocky was better than Toyota Raize because of the price. Because, according to him, the price depends on the choice of specifications available on the product.
"Not really, this is just an option because there are some of our cars that are expensive but he (Toyota) is also more expensive. The reason is because the choice of specs is different, tailored to the target customer," he said.
The price of Daihatsu Rocky if entering Indonesia is considered to be overpriced. According to Amel, when referring to prices in Japan, the possibility of the Indonesian market is difficult to accept.
"The price of a car with tax is almost the same. So if you buy and buy a car in Japan, let's say Rp. 100 million to Indonesia, the tax is Rp. 100 million, so it's double the shipping cost," he said.
To note Daihatsu Rocky prices in Japan are priced starting at Rp 219 million for the lowest variant and Rp 311 million for the highest variant. The price is slightly more expensive than the Toyota Raize, which starts at Rp 217 million to Rp 296 million.
"But whether we take a car from Japan (CBU) or not, we are still studying. We cannot enter directly because the price can be very expensive. It is not suitable for us," he said.
